attributes.action: make rugby union our national sport
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
its quite simple really
we are more sucessfull at rugby that we are at other any high profile sport.
it would also benefit our national clubs amature and professional and attract more members to play the sport.
profesional rugby players are good rolemodels to the youth and are on the whole more friendly that football players.
our national clubs in for e.g. the premiership would get a boost in their attendances and we would attract more players into the sport and have more profesional players to choose from when it comes to picking national teams for international competions.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
